label: insider_threat_05_dx_network_forensics_026
content:
## 2024-09-27 Daily Operations Summary

### Netflow Stats
- Total flows: 14697248
- Unique source IPs: 1770
- Unique destination IPs: 3092
- Average flow duration (sec): 36.1
- Top protocol TCP percentage: 87.4
- Top protocol UDP percentage: 16.0
- ICMP percentage: 0.6
- Long lived flows greater than 1 hour: 151
- East-West traffic percentage: 59.0

### Dns Query Analysis
- Total queries: 3218659
- Unique domains: 57914
- NXDOMAIN responses: 6387
- DGA suspected domains: 1
- DNS over HTTPS queries: 2696
- Average response time (ms): 2.5
- Cache hit percentage: 93.2
- TXT record queries: 649
- PTR queries: 5804

### Ids Ips Hits
- Total alerts: 708
- Blocked by IPS: 133
- Signature matches: 461
- Anomaly detections: 31
- Severity critical: 0
- Severity high: 17
- Severity medium: 75
- Severity low: 259
- Top signatures:
  - ET SCAN SSH Brute Force Attempt
  - ET POLICY SMB2 NT Create File
  - ET POLICY curl User-Agent Outbound
- False positive rate percentage: 17.6

### Bandwidth Utilization
- WAN inbound average (Gbps): 2.94
- WAN outbound average (Gbps): 2.78
- WAN peak (Gbps): 7.31
- LAN core utilization percentage: 54.9
- DMZ utilization percentage: 31.8
- VPN concentrator sessions: 309
- VPN bandwidth (Gbps): 1.75
- Top talker IP: 10.40.61.156
- Top talker bytes (GB): 21.5

### Bgp Changes
- Prefix announcements: 1
- Prefix withdrawals: 0
- AS path changes: 2
- Route flaps: 0
- Peer sessions established: 6
- Peer sessions down: 1
- Max prefix warnings: 1
- Communities changed: 1

### Tls Cert Transparency
- CT logs monitored: 6
- New entries for organization domains: 3
- Suspicious issuances: 0
- Expired certificates in use: 0
- TLS 1.0 connections: 0
- TLS 1.1 connections: 23
- TLS 1.2 connections: 53364
- TLS 1.3 connections: 193140
- Weak cipher usage: 0

### Infrastructure
- Netflow-collector-01:
  - CPU percentage: 55
  - Memory percentage: 64
  - Disk percentage: 76
- Dns-resolver-01:
  - CPU percentage: 35
  - Memory percentage: 60
  - Cache size (GB): 2.2
- Ids-sensor-01:
  - CPU percentage: 39
  - Memory percentage: 64
  - PPS: 129397
- Ids-sensor-02:
  - CPU percentage: 30
  - Memory percentage: 58
  - PPS: 121170
- Border-router-01:
  - CPU percentage: 34
  - Memory percentage: 49
  - Interface errors: 2

### Events
- IPS blocked 14 packets from 198.51.231.232: port sweep
- CT log alert: new certificate for api.company.com issued by Lets Encrypt — verified as authorized
- BGP route change: AS path prepend from ISP-A — investigated

### Notes
- Network monitoring daily report 2024-09-27. 14697248 flows analyzed. 3218659 DNS queries. 708 IDS alerts (0 critical, 17 high). WAN avg 2.94/2.78 Gbps in/out. 1 BGP announcements.
